release_notes.en-US:
New Features
  • Added the option to highlight and summarize selected text via right click
  • Added the option to summarize the entire page via right click
Bug Fixes
  • Fixed issue where keyboard shortcuts on select sites prevented typing in Orbit Sidebar
  • Orb should now be disabled when viewing an image
  • Orb position should now remain fixed where the user last left it
  • Fixed issue with numbered lists displaying incorrectly

description.en-US:
Unlock a new level of productivity with Orbit, the extension designed to streamline your online experience. Whether you're juggling emails, diving into lengthy documents, skimming through articles, or watching informative videos, Orbit has you covered. This simple but powerful tool provides concise summaries and allows you to ask questions about page content, helping you grasp essential information quickly without sacrificing your privacy. **10/30/24 Update** Thanks for trying out Orbit and sharing your feedback with us. We have a few updates to share:
  • At this time, the beta version of Orbit is only available in English.
  • You now have the option to use Orbit without the floating orb. To minimize the orb, adjust your settings by navigating to the Orbit add on and clicking the gear icon. Try it out and tell us what you think!
Key Features:
  • Quick Summarization: Get summaries of emails, documents, articles, and video transcripts on popular sites such as Gmail, Google Docs, YouTube, and more.
  • Private: Orbit doesn't require account creation or save your session data. The questions you ask are retained only as long as needed to process them.
  • User-Friendly: Simple and easy to use.
  • Interactive Q&A: Ask questions about page content and quickly find specific information.
  • Customizable Summaries: Choose your preferred summary length and format.
  • Question Recommendations: Get the most out of Orbit with relevant question recommendations.
  • No AI Training: Unlike other services, Orbit’s AI does not train on your data, ensuring your information remains private.
This beta version of Orbit is currently only available in English. Interested in support in other languages? Please share your feedback in our Mozilla Connect community. Why Choose Orbit? Orbit empowers you to stay informed and efficient by delivering the information you need in a condensed format. Say goodbye to information overload and hello to a more productive web experience. With no account needed and ease of use, Orbit is the perfect tool for anyone looking to optimize their online reading and viewing habits. Download Orbit Today: Transform how you interact with content on the web. Install Orbit now and enjoy the benefits of quick summaries and answers that keep you informed and productive. Privacy Note: Orbit doesn't require account creation and we don't use your data to train any models.
